languages.text: Старый сслит Злоба погиб, когда разъяренные ведьмы культа Губительной жажды карали всякого, кто помогал Вольному Торговцу. Надменный ксенос истребил многих врагов, и смерть его была мучительной и долгой. Но, по слухам, этот причудливый чувственный опыт он принял с любопытством.

The old Sslyth Malice died when enraged Wyches of the Cult of the Fatal Thirst punished everyone who had helped the Rogue Trader. The proud xenos had destroyed many of his enemies, and his death was long and painful. Though some say that he accepted this peculiar sensory experience with curiosity.
languages.original_text: Старый сслит Злоба погиб, когда разъяренные ведьмы культа Губительной жажды карали всякого, кто помогал Вольному Торговцу. Надменный ксенос истребил многих врагов, и смерть его была мучительной и долгой. Но, по слухам, этот причудливый чувственный опыт он принял с любопытством.

traits.locale_text: Old Sslyth Malice died when enraged Wyches of the cult of the Fatal Thirst punished everyone who helped the Rogue Trader. Proud xenos destroyed many of his enemies, and his death was long and painful. Though some say that he accepted this peculiar sensual experience with curiosity.

Old Sslyth Malice died when enraged Wyches of the cult of the Fatal Thirst punished everyone who helped the Rogue Trader. Proud xenos destroyed many of his enemies, and his death was long and painful. Though some say that he accepted this peculiar sensual experience with curiosity.

The old Sslyth Malice died when enraged Wyches of the Cult of the Fatal Thirst punished everyone who had helped the Rogue Trader. The proud xenos had destroyed many of his enemies, and his death was long and painful. Though some say that he accepted this peculiar sensory experience with curiosity.

The old Sslyth Malice died when enraged Wyches of the Cult of the Fatal Thirst punished everyone who had helped the Rogue Trader. The proud xenos had destroyed many of his enemies, and his death was long and painful. Though some say that he accepted this peculiar sensory experience with curiosity.

The old Sslyth Malice died when enraged Wyches of the Cult of the Fatal Thirst punished everyone who had helped the Rogue Trader. The proud xenos had destroyed many of his enemies, and his death was long and painful. Though some say that he accepted this peculiar sensory experience with curiosity.

The old Sslyth Malice died when enraged Wyches of the Cult of the Fatal Thirst punished everyone who had helped the Rogue Trader. The proud xenos had destroyed many of his enemies, and his death was long and painful. Though some say that he accepted this peculiar sensory experience with curiosity.

languages.text: 致命饥渴教派的巫灵怒不可遏，对所有帮助过行商浪人的人进行了报复，老蛇人“恶棍”恶意也被她们杀害。这只高傲的异形临死前杀死了许多敌人。尽管他的死亡漫长而痛苦，但有人说，恶棍实际上把这样的折磨当成了某种奇特的感官体验，满怀好奇接受了它。
languages.original_text: The old Sslyth Malice died when enraged Wyches of the Cult of the Fatal Thirst punished everyone who had helped the Rogue Trader. The proud xenos had destroyed many of his enemies, and his death was long and painful. Though some say that he accepted this peculiar sensory experience with curiosity.

traits.locale_text: 致命饥渴教派的巫灵怒不可遏，对所有帮助过行商浪人的人进行了报复，老蛇人“恶棍”恶意也被她们杀害。这只高傲的异形临死前杀死了许多敌人。尽管他的死亡漫长而痛苦，但有人说，恶棍实际上把这样的折磨当成了某种奇特的感官体验，满怀好奇接受了它。

languages.text: Der alte Sslyth Tücke starb, als zornige Hekatari des Kults des Fatalen Dursts alle bestraften, die {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} geholfen hatten. Der stolze Xenos hatte viele seiner Feinde vernichtet, und sein Tod war lang und schmerzhaft. Manche sagen aber, er habe dieses eigenartige sensorische Erlebnis mit großer Neugier akzeptiert.
languages.original_text: The old Sslyth Malice died when enraged Wyches of the Cult of the Fatal Thirst punished everyone who had helped the Rogue Trader. The proud xenos had destroyed many of his enemies, and his death was long and painful. Though some say that he accepted this peculiar sensory experience with curiosity.

traits.locale_text: Der alte Sslyth Tücke starb, als zornige Hekatari des Kults des Fatalen Dursts alle bestraften, die {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} geholfen hatten. Der stolze Xenos hatte viele seiner Feinde vernichtet, und sein Tod war land und schmerzhaft. Manche sagen aber, er habe dieses eigenartige sensorische Erlebnis mit großer Neugier akzeptiert.

languages.text: Malice mourut aux mains des furieuses Cérastes du Culte de la Soif Fatale, qui punissaient tous ceux qui avaient aidé {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}. Le vieux Sslyth avait éliminé un bon nombre de ses ennemis, ce qui lui valut une mort longue et douloureuse. Certains racontent cependant qu'il accueillit cette expérience sensorielle avec une curiosité particulière.
languages.original_text: The old Sslyth Malice died when enraged Wyches of the Cult of the Fatal Thirst punished everyone who had helped the Rogue Trader. The proud xenos had destroyed many of his enemies, and his death was long and painful. Though some say that he accepted this peculiar sensory experience with curiosity.

traits.locale_text: Malice mourut aux mains des furieuses Cérastes du Culte de la Soif Fatale, qui punissaient tous ceux qui avaient aidé {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}. Le vieux Sslyth avait éliminé un bon nombre de ses ennemis, ce qui lui valut une mort longue et douloureuse. Certains racontent cependant qu'il accueillit cette expérience sensorielle avec une curiosité particulière.

languages.text: El viejo Sslyth Malicia murió cuando las brujas furiosas del Culto de la Sed Letal castigaron a todos los que habían ayudado a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. El orgulloso xenos había destruido a muchos de sus enemigos, y su muerte fue un proceso largo y doloroso... aunque algunos creen que aceptó con curiosidad esa peculiar experiencia sensorial.
languages.original_text: The old Sslyth Malice died when enraged Wyches of the Cult of the Fatal Thirst punished everyone who had helped the Rogue Trader. The proud xenos had destroyed many of his enemies, and his death was long and painful. Though some say that he accepted this peculiar sensory experience with curiosity.

traits.locale_text: El viejo Sslyth Malicia murió cuando las brujas furiosas del Culto de la Sed Letal castigaron a todos los que habían ayudado a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. El orgulloso xenos había destruido a muchos de sus enemigos, y su muerte fue un proceso largo y doloroso... aunque algunos creen que aceptó con curiosidad esa peculiar experiencia sensorial.

languages.text: 年老いたススリス・マリスは、怒り狂った「宿命の渇き」教団のウィッチたちが自由開拓者を助けた者すべてを罰したときに死んだ。多くの敵を滅ぼした誇り高き異種族の死は、長く苦渋に満ちたものだった。しかし、彼はこの特異な感覚を好奇心を持って受け入れたという説もある。
languages.original_text: The old Sslyth Malice died when enraged Wyches of the Cult of the Fatal Thirst punished everyone who had helped the Rogue Trader. The proud xenos had destroyed many of his enemies, and his death was long and painful. Though some say that he accepted this peculiar sensory experience with curiosity.

traits.locale_text: 年老いたススリス・マリスは、怒り狂った「宿命の渇き」教団のウィッチたちが自由開拓者を助けた者すべてを罰したときに死んだ。多くの敵を滅ぼした誇り高き異種族の死は、長く苦渋に満ちたものだった。しかし、彼はこの特異な感覚を好奇心を持って受け入れたという説もある。

languages.text: Ölüme Susamışlığın Tarikatı'nın öfkeli Viçleri, Hür Tacir'e yardım eden herkesi cezalandırdığında ihtiyar Sslyth Melanet de öldü. Sayısız düşmanını alt etmiş olan şanlı zenonun ölümü, uzun ve acılı oldu. Gelgelelim bu alışılmadık deneyimi merak ve zevkle kabul ettiği de söylenir.
languages.original_text: The old Sslyth Malice died when enraged Wyches of the Cult of the Fatal Thirst punished everyone who had helped the Rogue Trader. The proud xenos had destroyed many of his enemies, and his death was long and painful. Though some say that he accepted this peculiar sensory experience with curiosity.

traits.locale_text: Ölüme Susamışlığın Tarikatı'nın öfkeli Viçleri, Hür Tacir'e yardım eden herkesi cezalandırdığında, ihtiyar Sslyth Melanet de öldü. Şanlı zeno sayısız düşmanını alt etti ve ölümü uzun ve acılı oldu. Hoş, bu alışılmadık hissiyattan kaynaklı deneyimi merak içinde kabul ettiğini söyleyenler de var.
